tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had gone to Dr Priyanka Kalra for RCT treatment for my left tooth which was badly infected along with some mild pain for 7-10 days. The doctor explained to me the complete treatment protocol in detail and finalized a convenient date for RCT procedure once my infection had subsided. The entire procedure was conducted with utmost care and precaution to ensure that I did not face any discomfort, whatsoever. Further, the doctor was also explaining to me at each stage, the various steps of how procedure was being conducted, which put me at ease. I was also impressed by the hygiene of this clinic and the friendliness of the support staff. I shall highly recommend Simplismile clinic for all Dental procedures. Post this RCT, I am planning a tooth implantation procedure here.
reply_text: Thank you so much sir , for your kind words. It's the encouragement from our patients that motivates us to strive for perfection

Thank you so much ma'am

context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Re-Root Canal Treatment,
review:
dr priyanka maam is expert in het work especially in RCT.  i had a very bad experience with my previous dentist.  he had taken 5 sitting for my molar RCT and it was again paining in just 2 months.  Dr priyanka showed me my xray and told it has to be repeated.  my treatment was done in 2 sess io ns only 
Thank u maam for prevention of extraction of my teeth
